question: Is it allowed to eat sweets which are purchased from shops which are run by Hindus.
answer:
QUESTION

Is it allowed to eat sweets which are purchased from shops which are run by Hindus.

Shop which are Run by Hindus do not contain any items which are non-veg. So is it allowed to purchase sweets from them, if they are of better quality and price.

ANSWER


Share:

If one is certain that all the ingredients are permissible for consumption, then it is permissible to purchase these sweets from Hindus.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
